channel.title: Fix bugs - showing hed wearing helmet
channel.description: OK, by showing head whilst wearing helmet i odnt mean its going in the wrong slot .. say if i were earing a d full helm on my server it would go in the helmet slot but some of the head is visible Same with some tops Can someone tell me how to fix this

item.title: Fix bugs - showing hed wearing helmet
item.dc:creator: @eczema3 eczema3
item.description:
@eczema3 wrote:

or do the same thig with item.java, not EVERYOne has item4…

Read full topic
item.source: Fix bugs - showing hed wearing helmet

item.title: Fix bugs - showing hed wearing helmet
item.dc:creator: @Pure_str433 Pure str433
item.description:
@Pure_str433 wrote:

Go to your server folder, double click on item4.java then put the item ID in the right section, it says something like intCapes, intFullhelms, intShield or something like that, just add the item ID at the end of the row. you may need to put it in 2 or more different rows such as Dragon Full helm…

It should be at the top.

Read full topic
item.source: Fix bugs - showing hed wearing helmet
